SELECT h."id", h."resume_id", j."name", f."name", h."salary", h."work_area", h."hunt_date", si."username" FROM hunt h INNER JOIN job j ON h."job_id" = j."id" INNER JOIN food_type f ON h."food_type_id" = f."id" INNER JOIN resume r ON h."resume_id" = r."id" INNER JOIN sys_user s ON r."user_id" = s."id" INNER JOIN sys_user_info si ON s."id" = si."sys_user_id"
WHERE h."work_area" = '${conditionDetail}'
WHERE j."name" = '${conditionDetail}'
WHERE h."salary" = '${conditionDetail}'
WHERE h."hunt_date" = '${conditionDetail}'
WHERE r."work_year" = '${conditionDetail}'

SELECT r."id", h."resume_id", si."username", si."signature", si."head_img_name", f."name" AS foodTypeName, r."education" , r."work_year", si."address", j."name" AS jobName, h.salary, h."browse_count", h."hunt_date" FROM resume r INNER JOIN sys_user s ON r."user_id" = s."id" INNER JOIN sys_user_info si ON s."id" = si."sys_user_id" INNER JOIN hunt h ON r."id" = h."resume_id" INNER JOIN food_type f ON h."food_type_id" = f."id" INNER JOIN job j ON h."job_id" = j."id"
WHERE r."id" = '${resumeId}'

SELECT r."id", si."username", j."name" AS jobName, h."hunt_date",h.salary FROM resume r INNER JOIN sys_user s ON r."user_id" = s."id" INNER JOIN sys_user_info si ON s."id" = si."sys_user_id" INNER JOIN hunt h ON r."id" = h."resume_id" INNER JOIN job j ON h."job_id" = j."id"
WHERE j."name" like '%${jobRecommend}%'
